pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NERCST[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/nercst.svg?label=PyPI&style=flat-square)](https://pypi.org/pypi/nercst/)[![Python](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/nercst.svg?label=Python&color=yellow&style=flat-square)](https://pypi.org/pypi/nercst/)[![Test](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/necst-telescope/NERCST/Test?logo=github&label=Test&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/necst-telescope/NERCST/actions)[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg?label=License&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/necst-telescope/NERCST/blob/main/LICENSE)Python package template.## FeaturesThis library provides:- Data reduction and calibration software for NECST telescopes.## Installation```shellpip install nercst```## UsageThis library is using [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org).
